alert.note: Alert for Kearney (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 18 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN KEARNEY COUNTY THROUGH 815 PM CDT... At 745 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Axtell, or 16 miles south of Kearney, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Minden around 750 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
